Marie Otte
October 2006

Healing Animals In Dreams

A variety of animals have appeared in my dreams. The deer has been my most frequent visitor. Even as a child, I felt a sense of peace when I encounter one of these creatures. The buck and doe have delivered me messages on receptivity, survival, ...read more

Marie Otte
Volume 25, issue 4: Make Way for the Animals in our Dreams
